attributes.action: Stop giving free money to those people who do not want to work for it!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vouchers should be given to all people in receipt of benifits instead of free money. These vouchers should be limited to the basic needs for living, eg. Food, water, clothing, electricity. In my opinion if you dont want to work you should have no luxuries provided by the taxpayer. I am sick to death of people not working for their money and living a better quality of life than me.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
